text: geuga daedabhagil naega gajin jihyelo malmiam-a jaemul-i naege ju eojyeossdoda hadeola hananimkkeseo boda him-i ganghago jaesan-i geuboda deo manh assdeon ijeon sedaedeul-eul myeolmangke han geos eul geuneun alji moshayeossneunyo joeindeul eun geudeul-ui joeag-e daehayeo jilmundo bad-eul pil-yoga eobsnola
